/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with buildings and trees, creating a corridor of urban life. Cars and buses fill the road, indicating a busy time of day. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a warm and sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky.
